messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE REPORT: #Z-9874-WR DATE: 08/29/36  The historic Woodland Library reported the discovery of a hidden room containing valuable manuscripts. Local legends had long hinted at such a chamber, but its existence was proven only now.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  CASE LEAD: Detective I. J. North was called in to authenticate the found items and ensure their security. ARCHAEOLOGICAL CONSULTANT: Detective K. L. Carter, with a background in archaeology, is determining the age of the room and manuscripts. SECURITY OFFICER: Captain M. N. Dale is working with the library to enhance security measures for the newfound assets. PATROL DETAILS: Patrol Officer O. P. Wood is maintaining a 24/7 presence at the library to deter potential thieves. The discovery has made national headlines, and there's keen interest from historians and scholars.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective I. J. North  
Officer Context: Detective North is authenticating the manuscripts and ensuring their protection.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective K. L. Carter  
Officer Context: Detective Carter, an archaeological consultant, is studying the age of the room and manuscripts.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Captain M. N. Dale  
Officer Context: Captain Dale is coordinating security measures for the discovered items.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer O. P. Wood  
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Wood is guarding the library around the clock.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officer
